### VERSION ###
DKSET(JSON_MAJOR_VERSION 3)
DKSET(JSON_MINOR_VERSION 9)
DKSET(JSON_BUILD_VERSION 1)
DKSET(JSON_VERSION libJSON-${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}.${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}.${JSON_BUILD_VERSION})

DKSET(JSON ${3RDPARTY}/${JSON_VERSION})
DKSET(JSON_INCLUDE_DIR ${JSON})
## DKSET(JSON_INCLUDE_DIR2 ${JSON}/${OS}) 


### INSTALL ###
DKINSTALL(https://sourceforge.net/projects/libJSON/files/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}/${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}.${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}.0-oldbetas/${JSON_VERSION}.tar.gz libJSON ${JSON_VERSION})


### LINK ###
DKINCLUDE(${JSON})
DKINCLUDE(${JSON}/${OS})
DKINCLUDE(${JSON}/${OS}/${RELEASE})
ANDROID_INCLUDE(${JSON}/${OS}/$(BUILD_TYPE)/jni)
WIN_DEBUG_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Debug/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_staticd.lib)
WIN_RELEASE_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Release/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static.lib)
APPLE_DEBUG_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/${DEBUG}/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}d.a)
APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}.a)
LINUX_DEBUG_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Debug/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}d.a)
LINUX_RELEASE_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Release/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}.a)
ANDROID_DEBUG_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Debug/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libJSON.a)
ANDROID_RELEASE_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Release/obj/local/armeabi-v7a/libJSON.a)
RASPBERRY_DEBUG_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Debug/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}d.a)
RASPBERRY_RELEASE_LIB(${JSON}/${OS}/Release/libJSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}.a)

### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A Win32 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /I${ZLIB}/${OS}" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" ${JSON})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(${JSON_VERSION} libJSON.sln JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(${JSON_VERSION} libJSON.sln JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)

DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A x64 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /I${ZLIB}/${OS}" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DJSON_SHARED=OFF -DJSON_TESTS=OFF -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/zlibstatic.lib ${JSON})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(${JSON_VERSION} libJSON.sln JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(${JSON_VERSION} libJSON.sln JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)

DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS})
MAC_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-I${ZLIB}/${OS} -DJSON_SHARED=OFF -DJSON_TESTS=OFF -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/libz.a ${JSON})
MAC_XCODE_DEBUG(${JSON_VERSION} JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)
MAC_XCODE_RELEASE(${JSON_VERSION} JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)

DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS})
IOS_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=OS -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-I${ZLIB}/${OS} -DJSON_SHARED=OFF -DJSON_TESTS=OFF -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libz.a ${JSON})
IOS_XCODE_DEBUG(${JSON_VERSION} JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)
IOS_XCODE_RELEASE(${JSON_VERSION} JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)

DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS})
IOSSIM_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${DKCMAKE}/iOS.cmake -DIOS_PLATFORM=SIMULATOR64 -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-I${ZLIB}/${OS} -DJSON_SHARED=OFF -DJSON_TESTS=OFF -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/${RELEASE}/libz.a ${JSON})
IOSSIM_XCODE_DEBUG(${JSON_VERSION} JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)
IOSSIM_XCODE_RELEASE(${JSON_VERSION} JSON${JSON_MAJOR_VERSION}${JSON_MINOR_VERSION}_static)


DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS}/Debug)
##-DJSON_SHARED=ON
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-I${ZLIB}/${OS}/Debug -DJSON_SHARED=OFF -DJSON_TESTS=ON -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Debug/libz.a ${JSON})
LINUX_DEBUG_COMMAND(make all)

DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS}/Release)
##-DJSON_SHARED=ON
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-I${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release -I${JSON}/${OS}/${RELEASE} -DJSON_SHARED=OFF -DJSON_TESTS=ON -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/libz.a ${JSON})
LINUX_RELEASE_COMMAND(make all)


ANDROID_NDK_DEBUG(${JSON_VERSION})
ANDROID_NDK_RELEASE(${JSON_VERSION})


DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS}/Debug)
RASPBERRY_DEBUG_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=DEBUG -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-I${ZLIB}/${OS}/Debug -DJSON_SHARED=ON -DJSON_TESTS=ON -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Debug/libz.a ${JSON})
RASPBERRY_DEBUG_COMMAND(make all)

DKSETPATH(${JSON}/${OS}/Release)
RASPBERRY_RELEASE_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Unix Makefiles" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RELEASE -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=-I${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release -DJSON_SHARED=ON -DJSON_TESTS=ON -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/libz.a ${JSON})
RASPBERRY_RELEASE_COMMAND(make all)
